bs_BA {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "KM",
            "BAK ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Bosnian language locale for Bosnia and Herzegowina" }
        Source { "adapted from Croatian locale" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "Tomislav Vujec" }
        Email { "tvujec@carnet.hr" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Bosnian" }
        Territory { "Bosnia and Herzegowina" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.3" }
        Date { "2001-01-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[dDyY]*." }
        NoExpression { "^[nN]*." }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;-\u00A4 #,##0.00",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "45" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy ",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss",
                    "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
                    "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Ned",
                            "Pon",
                            "Uto",
                            "Sri",
                            "\u010Cet",
                            "Pet",
                            "Sub",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Nedjelja",
                            "Ponedjeljak",
                            "Utorak",
                            "Srijeda",
                            "\u010Cetvrtak",
                            "Petak",
                            "Subota",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Jan",
                            "Feb",
                            "Mar",
                            "Apr",
                            "Maj",
                            "Jun",
                            "Jul",
                            "Aug",
                            "Sep",
                            "Okt",
                            "Nov",
                            "Dec",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Januar",
                            "Februar",
                            "Mart",
                            "April",
                            "Maj",
                            "Juni",
                            "Juli",
                            "August",
                            "Septembar",
                            "Oktobar",
                            "Novembar",
                            "Decembar",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
